snippet.title: Valentino Rossi The Game - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
#ValentinoRossiTheGame is now available for PlayStation®4, Xbox One®, the all-in-one games and entertainment system, and Windows PC/STEAM.

. The game will be available in different editions: 

- Collector Edition includes PS4™ Valentino Rossi The Game full game, Steelbook, Season Pass, Official Flag VR46, Official MotoGP™ hat, wristband #ValentinoRossiTheGame and 2 A2 Valentino Rossi signed posters
- Stand alone PS4™, Xbox One®®, the all-in-one games and entertainment system, and PC/STEAM™
- Digital Special Edition: Valentino Rossi The Game full game and Season Pass – available on PS4™ and STEAM™
- PS4™ Digital Deluxe: Valentino Rossi The Game full game, all the DLCs, 10 avatars and 2 themes – one exclusive.
